title: Womens movement in antebellum p. - characteristics

content.question: The womenâ€™s movement in the antebellum period was characterized by all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: close links with the antislavery and temperance movements
conventions in the Northeast and the Midwest, but not the South
a broad-based platform of legal and educational rights
demands for equal compensation for equal work

content.answer: demands for equal compensation for equal work

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
